name: Povio
all_locations: San Francisco, CA, USA; Ljubljana, Ljubljana, Slovenia
long_description:
Povio is helping founders build their digital products.

With over 1000 successfully delivered projects, we have worked together with multinationals like Volkswagen, unicorns like Flexport and notable personalities like Serena Williams.

Povio has an in-house team of over 200 developers, designers and project managers. Additionally the company is backed by a network of 300+ on-demand freelancers that have gone through our hiring process and can help scale the projects. We work on the entire product journey, from research and product design to development, maintenance and engineering team scaling.

With a rigorous hiring process, we assure the highest quality possible and strive to create long term relationships by partnering with our clients.
one_liner: A design and software development company.
